summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, forwards a message summarizing the assets to be transferred to Pershing LLC, including various financial instruments and cash wire instructions. The email highlights the financial dealings associated with Epstein's assets.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is involved in the communication regarding the transfer of assets related to Epstein.

persons.name: Janet Young
persons.context: Janet Young is the sender of the original message regarding the asset transfer, providing details about the assets being transferred to Pershing LLC.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is one of the recipients of the forwarded email discussing the asset transfer related to Epstein.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is another recipient of the forwarded email regarding the asset transfer.

persons.name: Harry Baller
persons.context: Harry Baller is included in the email as a cc recipient, indicating he is also involved in the asset transfer discussion.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby forwards a message from Janet Young regarding the asset transfer, indicating a professional relationship within Deutsche Bank.
Amanda Kirby includes Paul Morris in the email chain about the asset transfer, suggesting they work together at Deutsche Bank.
Amanda Kirby forwards the asset transfer information to Vahe Stepanian, indicating a collaborative work relationship.
Janet Young includes Harry Baller in the email, suggesting they are colleagues involved in the asset transfer process.

keyFacts: The document discusses the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein to Pershing LLC.
Amanda Kirby is the associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas managing the communication.
The assets include various financial instruments and cash wire instructions.
The email indicates a need for EURO wire instructions for currency transfer.
Several financial instruments with specific details and values are listed for transfer.
